articles.title: Pakistan's former President Pervez Musharraf dies in Dubai - CNN
articles.description: Pakistan's former President General Pervez Musharraf has died in Dubai after a prolonged illness at Dubai American Hospital, according to a statement from the Pakistani military. He was 79 years old.
